violations.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.94 (foreground color: #808080, background color: #ffffff, font size: 13.2pt (17.6px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

violations.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
violations.help: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

any.message: The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.16:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #0075d9, surrounding text: #808080)
The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.16:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #0075d9, surrounding text: #808080)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text
